mapper.select: SELECT s.script_name AS scriptName, o.create_time AS orderCreateTime, o.order_status AS orderStatus, o.refund_time AS refundTime, o.order_number AS orderNumber, o.order_flag AS orderFlag, o.script_id AS scriptId, o.forward_date AS forwardDate, o.forward_end_date AS forwardEndDate FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN script s ON s.id = o.script_id WHERE o.user_id = #{filed} AND o.forward_date > #{timeCurrent} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC LIMIT #{i},10
